intro.title: Our Activities
intro.description: At Deravasi Mahajan, activities are not just yearly programmes â€” they are continuous efforts to preserve traditions, strengthen unity, and serve society. Each initiative reflects our values of seva, sahyog and sanskriti.

items.title: Sanghbhavana Newsletter
items.description: A regular publication to share news, updates, and inspiring stories with the community.

items.title: Central Mediation Committee
items.description: Guidance for families, resolving disputes, and counselling youth in choosing life partners.

items.title: Health Awareness Camps
items.description: Medical check-ups, senior citizen camps, yoga sessions and seminars for a healthier society.

items.title: Sports Activities
items.description: Events like throwball tournaments, marathons, and fitness drives to encourage unity and physical well-being.

items.title: Scholarships and Grants
items.description: Financial support for higher studies and professional courses.

items.title: Skill Development
items.description: Seminars, entrepreneur workshops, Spell Bee competitions, and personality development sessions for students.

items.title: Bherpo
items.description: A platform for children, youth and elders to display their talents in art, culture and literature.

items.title: Support for Differently-Abled Children
items.description: Initiatives to empower and include them in society.

items.title: Utkarsh Committee
items.description: Providing financial aid, housing and business loans to families in need.

items.title: Relief Work
items.description: Standing strong during floods, pandemics and other crises with food, medicines, testing facilities and business revival loans.

items.title: Publishing Jain Literature
items.description: Publishing Jain booklets and literature for spiritual awareness.

items.title: Celebrating Festivals
items.description: Organising discourses and cultural events to preserve our heritage.

charity.title: Charity & Giving
charity.description: Support through Jivdaya donations, Bhagirath schemes, educational funds and Devdravya contributions, ensuring help reaches where it is needed most.

conclusion.description: Every activity is a step towards a stronger, healthier and united community.
